comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: This is possibly the loading at Newark? end of March? 1931 for a sea-crossing to Cherbourg, France, from where Hawks flew to Paris on 6 April 1931, starting a European tour....8 references to 'Texaco 13' here: www.flightglobal.com/pdfarchive/search.aspx?ArchiveSearch...
